title: Tournaments
body: i have a 5v5 team and we play a lot together and we were thinking it would be nice to enter some tournaments and see if we could win some things. i saw under custom you can enter a tournament code. my question is if there are tournaments out there, how can i find them and sign up?

replies.body: A lot of people will post about tournaments on the regular forums. I'm not sure about many options unless you're in challenger, so maybe give those forums a try. :p

There are many weekly tournaments but most of the time they are for local communities (college, city, country)...

There are few posts that talked about aggregating all LoL online tournies and I realized all the links are now broken...
The one that remains up and running is:  [alienwarearena.com](http://alienwarearena.com) (on several games)
I searched and it seems that a new alternative is [ForPlayers.com](http://www.ForPlayers.com) (exclusively LoL)

Post some new ones if you come accross great platforms!

Hey BlameIt0nTheADC!

This is actually a very interesting question that I do not see all too often!  If you wish to get a introductory idea as to different tournaments that you can enter (Beyond the Coke Zero Challenger League), you can check out our Tournament Page here:

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/community/prized-events

I hope this helps!  I wish you the best of luck to you and your team! :)
